definition: milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Clay bars should only be used by professionals.
sentences.chinese: 研磨泥只适用于专业类产品吗？

sentences.english: Suitable for soft to medium hard Non-abrasive formation.
sentences.chinese: 适应于软到中硬非研磨性地层。

sentences.english: Even when we reduce the salt to a fine powder , it will taste well.
sentences.chinese: 即使我们把盐研磨成很小的粉末，他尝起来还是咸的。

sentences.english: Smith also designed a special needle and a needle sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯也设计了一个特殊的针和一个注射针研磨器。

sentences.english: The pressure of common gritting waves randomly.
sentences.chinese: 普通研磨压力随机波动，变化无规律性。

sentences.english: The factory also has grinding polishing parts of the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 厂内还设有零部件研磨抛光工艺试验室。

sentences.english: Heating plate cast-1 ron, surface grinded and chrome-plated treatment.
sentences.chinese: 铸铁制品表面经研磨和镀铬处理。

sentences.english: Meguiar's pure polishes are non-abrasive and totally safe for your car's finish.
sentences.chinese: 美光的纯抛光剂是非研磨性的，而且对漆面绝对安全。

sentences.english: The three-tier Grinding drum machine, you can take 36 drum.
sentences.chinese: 三层研磨滚筒机，可以放36个滚筒。

sentences.english: An abrasive or filler used in a soap or detergent.
sentences.chinese: 增清剂肥皂或去污剂中用的研磨剂或填料。

sentences.english: Protect all machined and lapped mating surfaces from damage.
sentences.chinese: 保护所有零件表面避免损害，如有刮伤须研磨。

sentences.english: Baby Orajel Tooth & Gum Cleanser also does not foam and does not contain abrasives.
sentences.chinese: 无氟配方，安全可吞咽，并且不含泡沫及研磨剂。

sentences.english: Portable grinders should be handled with care to avoid damaging the grinding wheel.
sentences.chinese: 可动的研磨机小心用手持，避免损伤磨轮。

sentences.english: The solid phase abrading and calcining at the proper temperature are necessary to this step.
sentences.chinese: 对这一过程，固相研磨和合适温度的焙烧是必须的。

sentences.english: Sturdily mount the clamping device of machine.
sentences.chinese: 研磨机夹持必须安装牢固。

sentences.english: As he did so, every piece of rice changed into a gold coin.
sentences.chinese: 结果，每粒被研磨过的米都变成了金币。

definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
